title: Drawing, "Stream Leading to the Rim of the Falls Near Hacienda Chillo, Ecuador", June 26, 1857
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on cream-colored paper
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at lower left:  Lugt 457c
Verso;  Stamped in ink, at lower center:  Lugt 457e
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with numbers at various locations; again, at lower right:  4 Intense Black shadow / 2 rich yellow green / 3 Darker green; and at bottom right:  Fall near "Hacienda Chillo".
description: Horizontal view stream running in down to the rim of the hidden falls among surrounding hills forming the background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Stream Leading to the Rim of the Falls Near Hacienda Chillo, Ecuador", June 26, 1857.
June 26, 1857. Graphite, brush and white gouache on cream-colored paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-172.
